# hide()

**Type Method**

Creates an action that hides a node.

## Declaration

```swift
class func hide() -> SCNAction
```

## Return Value

A new action object.

## Discussion

When the action executes, the node’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/isHidden] property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

This action is reversible; the reverse is equivalent to the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNAction/unhide()] action.

## Creating Actions That Change a Node’s Visibility

- **unhide()**: Creates an action that ensures a node is not hidden.
